DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety efficacy Glaukos® Suprachoroidal Stent Model G3 conjunction cataract surgery , compare cataract surgery , subject mild moderate primary open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Investigation Glaukos® Suprachoroidal Stent Model G3 In Conjunction With Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This IDE trial evaluate safety efficacy Glaukos® Suprachoroidal Stent Model G3 ( hereinafter refer G3 ) conjunction cataract surgery , compare cataract surgery , subject mild moderate primary open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate openangle glaucoma Characteristics consistent mild moderate glaucoma Use one ( 1 ) three ( 3 ) medication time screen exam Pigmentary pseudoexfoliative glaucoma Prior incisional glaucoma surgery
